item.title: Multidimensional & Dimensionality Reduction
item.description:
Required Chapter 12: Visualizing associations in Claus Wilke, Fundamentals of Data VisualizationClaus E. Wilke, Fundamentals of Data Visualization (Sebastopol, California: O’Reilly Media, 2018), https://serialmentor.com/dataviz/.
Chapter 4: Multivariate Analysis in Riccardo Mazza, Introduction to Information Visualization Recommended Kieran Healy, “Two y-axes” Tyler Bradley, “PCA in a tidy(verse) framework” David Schoch, “Dimensionality Reduction Methods using FIFA 18 Player Data”

item.title: Statistical Models
item.description: Required Chapter 6: Work with Models in Healy. Chapter 22: Model introduction and Chapter 23: Model basics in Wickham/Grolemund. Recommended Chapter 6: Basic Regression from “ModernDive: An Introduction to Statistical and Data Sciences via R” by Chester Ismay and Albert Y. Kim.This is an outstanding new book – with a free online version – that will be a big complement to the tidyverse in the future.

item.title: Distributions & Uncertainty

Wilke, Fundamentals of Data Visualization (Sebastopol, California: O’Reilly Media, 2018), https://serialmentor.com/dataviz/.
Multiple Views Blog: Uncertainty Visualizations Explained by Jessica Hullman and Matthew Kay Recommended Why It’s So Hard for Us to Visualize Uncertainty
